about_the_game:
just pressed the computer's power button......  I was transported to another world! 

 

Legend has it that there are five runes of Creation on this continent, and no one knows what power the runes hold. 

 
Thousands of years ago, the demon Lord and the brave used the power of runes to separate the demon world from the human world, which led to a thousand years of peace in the world.  Good times did not last long, after the demon king died unexpectedly, the power rune of the lost demon King is no longer stable, split into five pieces scattered around the world, the human world and the demon world also re-fused together, the war between the human world and the demon world also lasted for a hundred years, until a brave man suddenly appeared from another world...  
After the fantastic events of this novel story......  In order to return to the real world, or in order to save the world, as a brave man in the sword and magic of the world to go all out! 

Move forward in the magical world and accept the destiny of being the brave guardian of this world. Complete the main line of history's destiny, capture notorious guys with a sudden reward, and take on powerful enemies, dungeons, and difficult dungeon battles in the future!

Explore the vast semi-open world, discover all the great stories and fun Easter eggs, and try to unlock all the achievements!

Fishing, wine fighting, commission, gathering, and more casual games such as hunting, treasure digging, collection and production, and homestead will be coming in the future, and will be linked to other content.

Explore the treasures of world history books, libraries, stories, and discover the vast world view and story line buried in the deep sea!

- Continue to release major content updates, and will continue to release massive new content based on the original schedule and player suggestions (even if it reaches official 1.0)
